text: The 2019 Calcutta Premier Division season was the 122nd season of the Calcutta Premier Division, a state association football league within the Indian state of West Bengal. It started from 26 July 2019. It has two divisions. CFL Premier Division A and CFL Premier Division B. Peerless SC scripted history as they become the only club outside the Big Three Mohun Bagan, East Bengal, & Mohammedan to win the Championship in 61 years. Eastern Railway did the same back in 1958. == Premier Division A == ===Managers and foreign players=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Team ! Manager ! Player 1 ! Player 2 ! Player 3 ! Player 4 !
